item.title: 中国比特币挖矿机主导制造商在美国建立生产基地以抵御关税
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税战重塑了加密货币供应链，全球最畅销的三家比特币挖矿机制造商--全部来自中国--正在美国建立生产基地。【原文：The world's three best-selling makers of bitcoin mining machines - all of Chinese origin - are setting up manufacturing footholds in the United States as President Donald Trump's tariff war reshapes the cryptocurrency supply chain.】

item.title: 早间竞价美联储会议结果出炉前阴霾弥漫
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 空中客车公司将提高派息范围，并确认指导原则
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus）周三表示，将把股息支付率上限从目前的 30%-40% 扩大到 30%-50%。【原文：Airbus said on Wednesday that it will extend its upper range of its dividend payout to 30%-50% from the current payout ratio of 30%-40%.】

item.title: 新加坡金管局调查显示经济学家下调国内生产总值和通胀预期，并认为将进一步放宽政策
item.description: 新加坡金融管理局（Monetary Authority of Singapore）周三对预测者进行的一项调查显示，经济学家下调了对新加坡今年经济增长和通货膨胀的预测，并预计下个月将进一步放宽货币政策。【原文：Economists have lowered their forecasts for Singapore's growth and inflation this year and are expecting a further easing of monetary policy next month, a survey of forecasters by the Monetary Authority of Singapore showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 地区顶级银行家称，高盛利用改革提升亚洲投资银行份额
item.description: 华尔街高盛新任命的地区投资银行主管告诉路透社，高盛将在亚洲进行重大改革，以占据更大的投资银行市场份额，并抓住 "强劲的发展机遇"。【原文：Goldman Sachs will leverage a major revamp in Asia to capture a larger share of the investment banking market and capitalize on "strong tailwinds", the Wall Street bank's newly appointed regional investment banking chief told Reuters.】

item.title: 投资者在美联储会议前关注以色列与伊朗冲突，美元持稳
item.description: 周三早些时候，美元兑主要货币保持涨势，受安全需求提振，因为在美联储当天晚些时候做出利率决定之前，以色列和伊朗之间的冲突令投资者惶惶不安。【原文：The U.S. dollar held on to gains against major currencies early on Wednesday, buoyed by demand for safety as conflict between Israel and Iran kept investors on edge ahead of a Federal Reserve decision on interest rates later in the day.】

item.title: 中东冲突愈演愈烈，市场翘首以待美联储
item.description: 周三，对中东敌对行动升级的担忧仍是市场关注的焦点，导致油价上涨，投资者急于购买安全的美国国债和美元，同时抛售股票。【原文：Concerns over escalating hostilities in the Middle East stayed front and centre in markets on Wednesday, sending oil prices higher and investors rushing for the safety of U.S. Treasuries and the dollar while dumping stocks.】

item.title: 山姆-奥特曼称 Meta 为 OpenAI 员工提供了 1 亿美元奖金
item.description: OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-阿尔特曼（Sam Altman）说，Meta 为其员工提供了 1 亿美元的奖金来招募他们，因为这家科技巨头正努力加强其人工智能战略。【原文：OpenAI CEO Sam Altman said that Meta has offered his employees bonuses of $100 million to recruit them, as the tech giant seeks to ramp up its artificial intelligence strategy.】

item.title: 伊朗-以色列冲突进入第六天，油价继续上涨
item.description: 周三早盘，由于担心伊朗和以色列的冲突可能会扰乱石油供应，油价在上一交易日结束时上涨了4%以上。【原文：Oil prices ticked up in early trading on Wednesday after ending the previous session up more than 4% on worries that the Iran-Israel conflict could disrupt supplies.】

item.title: 美国汽车工人联合会（UAW）主席法因（Fain）被发现在费用纠纷中对高级官员进行报复
item.description: 负责监督美国汽车工人工会的联邦监察员发现，该工会主席肖恩-费恩（Shawn Fain）在与工会秘书兼财务主管就支出问题产生分歧后对其进行了报复。【原文：The federal monitor overseeing the United Auto Workers union has found that its president, Shawn Fain, retaliated against the union's secretary-treasurer after disagreements over spending.】

item.title: 中国小米将于 6 月底发布 YU7 电动 SUV
item.description: 中国科技公司小米首席执行官雷军周三在其微博上表示，小米计划于 6 月底开始接受新款 YU7 电动运动型多用途车的订单。【原文：Chinese technology company Xiaomi plans to start taking orders for its new YU7 electric sports utility vehicle at the end of June, its CEO Lei Jun said on Wednesday on his Weibo account.】

item.title: 美国对汽车征收关税，日本出口出现 8 个月来首次下降
item.description: 周三的数据显示，日本5月份的出口额出现了八个月来的首次下降，这表明美国的全面关税正在威胁日本脆弱的经济复苏。【原文：Japan's exports fell for the first time in eight months in May, data showed on Wednesday, indicating that sweeping U.S. tariffs were threatening the country's fragile economic recovery.】

item.title: 聚焦：中国制药项目因中美紧张局势而中断
item.description: 知情人士称，包括药明康德和药明生物在内的中国药物研发公司正在改变项目计划、囤积供应品并讨论在当地进行测试，以寻求缓解中美贸易紧张局势的影响。【原文：Drug research and development firms in China including WuXi AppTec and WuXi Biologics are changing project plans, stockpiling supplies and discussing testing locally, said sources with knowledge of the matter, as they seek to mitigate the impact of U.S.-China trade tensions.】

item.title: 受关税和中国困境影响，6 月日本制造商信心下滑
item.description: 路透社 Tankan 民意调查显示，6 月份日本制造商对经营状况的信心有所下降，并对未来三个月的前景表示谨慎，理由是美国关税不确定性和中国需求疲软。【原文：Japanese manufacturers grew less confident about business conditions in June and expressed caution about the outlook for the next three months, citing U.S. tariff uncertainties and weak Chinese demand, a Reuters Tankan poll showed.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Viasat 被确认为中国 "盐台风 "网络间谍活动的受害者
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，Viasat 公司已被确认为去年总统竞选期间与中国有关的 Salt Typhoon 网络间谍行动的受害者。【原文：Viasat Inc has been identified as a victim of the Chinese-linked Salt Typhoon cyberespionage operation during last year's presidential campaign, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 加拿大 TC 能源公司在特拉华州关于哥伦比亚公司收购案的上诉中抹去了 1.99 亿美元的赔偿损失
item.description: 特拉华州最高法院周二驳回了法官要求加拿大输油管运营商 TC Energy 支付 1.992 亿美元赔偿金的命令，该赔偿金源于其 2016 年斥资 130 亿美元收购哥伦比亚输油管集团（Columbia Pipeline Group）。【原文：Delaware's highest court on Tuesday threw out a judge's order requiring Canadian pipeline operator TC Energy to pay $199.2 million of damages stemming from its $13 billion purchase of Columbia Pipeline Group in 2016.】

item.title: 通用磨坊将从其所有美国谷物和食品中去除人工色素
item.description: 通用磨坊（General Mills）周二表示，它将在 2027 年底之前从其全部美国零售产品组合中去除人工色素。【原文：General Mills said on Tuesday it would remove artificial colors from its full U.S. retail portfolio by the end of 2027.】

item.title: 白宫表示，特朗普将第三次延长 TikTok 出售期限
item.description: 白宫周二表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将把中国字节跳动公司（ByteDance）剥离短视频应用 TikTok 美国资产的 6 月 19 日最后期限延长 90 天，尽管法律规定如果没有重大进展，就必须出售或关闭 TikTok。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump will extend a June 19 deadline for China-based ByteDance to divest the U.S. assets of short video app TikTok by 90 days despite a law that had mandated a sale or a shutdown absent significant progress, the White House said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国参议院通过稳定币法案，成为加密货币行业的里程碑
item.description: 美国参议院周二通过了一项法案，为与美元挂钩的加密代币--稳定币--建立监管框架，这是数字资产行业的一个分水岭。【原文：The U.S. Senate on Tuesday passed a bill to create a regulatory framework for U.S.-dollar-pegged cryptocurrency tokens known as stablecoins, in a watershed moment for the digital asset industry.】

item.title: 墨西哥电信监管机构以垄断行为为由对 Telcel 罚款 9,300 万美元
item.description: 墨西哥电信巨头 America Movil 周二称，墨西哥电信监管机构对其子公司 Telcel 的垄断行为处以 17.8 亿比索（约合 9361 万美元）的罚款。【原文：Mexican telecommunications giant America Movil said on Tuesday that that the nations telecoms regulator fined its subsidiary Telcel 1.78 billion pesos ($93.61 million) for monopolistic practices, which the company denied and pledged to challenge.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：玩具制造商孩之宝裁员 3
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二报道，孩之宝公司已在全球裁员 3%，以期在关税提高的情况下削减成本。【原文：Hasbro has cut 3% of its global workforce in a bid to cut costs amid higher tariffs, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 拉丁美洲国家将于 9 月推出自己的人工智能模型
item.description: 智利官员周二表示，十几个拉美国家正在合作于 9 月份推出 Latam-GPT，这是首个经过训练的大型人工智能语言模型，能够理解该地区的多元文化和语言细微差别。【原文：A dozen Latin American countries are collaborating to launch Latam-GPT in September, the first large artificial intelligence language model trained to understand the region's diverse cultures and linguistic nuances, Chilean officials said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国限制出口后锑短缺，电池制造商忧心忡忡
item.description: 当中国限制一种重要矿产的出口时，有时这种痛苦是突如其来的，甚至是致命的--几乎足以立即引发一场轩然大波。但有时，人们需要更长的时间才能感受到这种痛苦。【原文：When China restricts exports of a key mineral, sometimes the pain is sudden and even crippling - enough to spur a major outcry almost immediately. Other times, it takes longer to be felt.】

item.title: 交易日：局势升级加剧恐惧
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 独家报道马斯克的 xAI 公司有望在需求不高的情况下筹集 50 亿美元新债务
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的人士透露，尽管投资者需求不高，但埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 xAI 公司有望完成由摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）牵头的 50 亿美元债务融资。【原文：Elon Musk's xAI is on track to close on a $5 billion debt raise led by Morgan Stanley, despite tepid investor demand, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Meta 表示，所有新的 Facebook 视频将很快被归类为 Reels 视频
item.description: 社交媒体巨头 Meta Platforms 周二表示，Facebook 上传的所有新视频将很快被归类为 Reels，从而简化了用户发布视觉内容的方式。【原文：All new videos uploaded on Facebook will soon be classified as Reels, simplifying how users publish visual content, social media giant Meta Platforms said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 小型企业寻求最高法院尽早审查特朗普的关税政策
item.description: 一家小型企业周二要求美国最高法院裁定唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税措施是否合法，并称法院应采取罕见的措施，在下级法院的上诉充分展开之前审理此案。【原文：A small business on Tuesday asked the U.S. Supreme Court to decide the legality of President Donald Trump’s tariffs, saying the court should take the rare step of hearing the case before appeals fully play out in lower courts.】

item.title: 美国流媒体收视率首次超过广播和有线电视
item.description: 据收视率测量公司尼尔森（Nielsen）周二发布的报告显示，流媒体服务在美国的收视率稳步上升，最终击败了广播和有线电视，5 月份的收视率超过了广播和有线电视收视率的总和。【原文：Streaming services, which have been steadily gaining in popularity, have finally dethroned broadcast and cable television in the U.S., winning more viewers in May than broadcast and cable combined, audience measurement firm Nielsen reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 亚马逊因推出生成式人工智能和代理而减少员工人数
item.description: 在线零售商首席执行官安迪-贾西（Andy Jassy）周二在给员工的一份说明中写道，生成式人工智能和代理的推广将在未来几年内减少亚马逊的员工总数。【原文：Rollout of generative AI and agents will reduce Amazon's total corporate workforce in the next few years, Andy Jassy, CEO of the online retailer wrote in a note to employees on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美联储宣布召开会议讨论放宽银行杠杆率规定
item.description: 美联储将在本月晚些时候的一次会议上考虑放宽对大型银行杠杆率要求的计划，这将拉开重新考虑银行规则的序幕。【原文：The Federal Reserve will consider plans to ease leverage requirements on larger banks at a meeting later this month, kicking off what is expected to be a broad effort to reconsider bank rules.】
